titles.title: To amend the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States relating to the definition of raw value for purposes of raw sugar import tariff rate quota.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Unfavorable Executive Comment Received from Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 10/29/1997--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to revise the method of calculating "raw value" for purposes of determining the tariff rate quota on certain imported raw cane sugar.
